tatami.pc.util.windowLayout

Class WindowParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.pc.util.windowLayout.WindowParameters

  • public class WindowParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies all parameters necessary for a window to be created. The parameters are calculated according to the allocation made by the WindowLayout.

    Also contains other non-public data to characterize the window, used by WindowLayout.

    From the exterior, it can only be used for reading parameters when creating the window.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

        public void setWindow(java.awt.Frame window,

        Parameters:
